Reviews.Title: Promising!
Reviews.Author: Debbie T. "Sparky"
Reviews.Content: I have taken just over 100 photos with this camera since receiving it in the mail on Tuesday (after ordering it on Amazon on Sunday - FAST SHIPPING!)!  So far I love it.  I have been trying for a few years to find a camera that compares to the Panasonic DMC-FZ50 I have used for about 6 years and taken over 360,000 photos with.  I also have a Canon T3i, but don't like it nearly as well as I like my FZ50.  The FZ200 seems to be just what I have been searching for.  It has new and updated features from my FZ50 and it has the 3" rotating LCD screen.  I am optimistic that this is the camera I have been searching for ... can't wait to use it for some of my photo shoots.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: jbclarke394
Reviews.Content: My ONLY complaint about the camera is I do wish it was a 16M but it is only a 12M, which is fine, I would have just perfered the 16...but so far I love the camera!  i still have a lot to learn about it, but no complaints so far...
